summary: The city council of Mercedes debated over the usage of funds from the sale of a land in the Industrial Planning Sector. The opposition parties expressed concern about the lack of transparency regarding the destination of these funds.
source_title: Concejales de la UCR critican al oficialismo por la falta de diálogo sobre el destino de 500 mil dólares del Parque Industrial

summary: Art exhibit titled 'Encuentro natural' inaugurated at Colegio de Arquitectos – Distrito 5 in Mercedes on April 26.
source_title: Se inaugura una nueva muestra de arte en el Colegio de Arquitectos

summary: The Union Civica Radical held an event for the asumption of new local committee authorities in San Miguel, Buenos Aires. The event emphasized the need for permanent dialogue between party leaders, legislators, and militants.
source_title: Dirigentes mercedinos participaron del acto de asunción de autoridades de la UCR en San Miguel

summary: Bernardo Zubeldía is opening a local partisan office in Mercedes. The event highlights the initiative to create a Volunteer Blood Bank, aiming to institutionalize community solidarity and improve emergency response times.
source_title: Bernardo Zubeldía abre su local y reafirma su compromiso comunitario con una propuesta concreta

location: Mercedes, Argentina (and Gowland, a locality within Mercedes)
summary: Political group 'Principios y Valores' holds weekly rallies in Mercedes and this Saturday visited Gowland. They engaged in door-to-door dialogues with locals.
source_title: «Principios y Valores» recorre Mercedes con la propuesta de Guillermo Moreno

summary: Argentine national deputy Vanesa Siley criticizes government's labor policies, stating that after more than a year of governance, the reforms implemented by the current administration have failed. She also mentioned that laws such as Law Bases and DNU 70/2023 did not improve registered employment but rather increased informal labor.
source_title: Vanesa Siley: “Las reformas laborales de Milei fracasaron”

summary: Justicialist group Principios y Valores calls for a table of work to decide the use of funds from a sold industrial property in Mercedes. The goal is to create a productive or social development project.
source_title: Principios y Valores propuso una mesa de trabajo para definir el destino de fondos

summary: The City of Mercedes is building a new fire station in Gowland using funds originally allocated for industrial infrastructure.
source_title: «Plantear que haya fondos públicos sobre los que no existe control es absolutamente falso»

summary: A new political space led by María Eugenia Talerico will be officially launched with its own brand on 202X-04-29 in Mercedes. The new coalition aims to present a local alternative as well.
source_title: Carlos Mosso se suma al espacio de María Eugenia Talerico y anticipa presentación local

summary: Mass Crismal celebrated in the Catedral Basílica de Mercedes on April 16, 2023, attended by local clergy and faithful.
source_title: Misa Crismal: arzobispo llamó a cuidar la espiritualidad y la afectividad para no perder el fervor pastoral

summary: Traditional Visita a las Siete Iglesias event took place in Mercedes on Thursday night despite heavy rain.
source_title: A pesar de la lluvia, se realizó la tradicional visita a las siete iglesias en Mercedes

summary: Members of the cultural project CUNA have presented a formal note to the Deliberative Council of Mercedes demanding that the space returns to functioning with an integrated commission as stated in the ordinance that gave it origin.
source_title: Integrantes de CUNA reclaman al Legislativo y Ejecutivo el cumplimiento de la ordenanza de creación

summary: Improvements made in three educational institutions of Mercedes: repair of filtrations and roofing in the Special School No. 503, installation of new doors in all classrooms at Primary School No. 13, and improvement of the playground and addition of a mangrove for children's enjoyment at Kindergarten No. 905.
source_title: Escuelas públicas mejoran su infraestructura gracias al Presupuesto Participativo

summary: Community of San José Obrero in Mercedes is holding its Patron Saints' festival on May 1, 2022, with a mass at 11 am, followed by a community lunch and sale of lentil stew for charity.
source_title: Comunidad de San José Obrero celebra Fiestas Patronales el 1° de mayo

summary: On March 24, 1976, a military coup occurred in Argentina, marking the beginning of a dark period characterized by state violence.
source_title: 24 de marzo: Memoria y Reflexión

summary: A military coup took place in Argentina on March 24, 1976. The event is remembered by Virginia Altube as it affected her family and many others, leading to solidarity among people.
source_title: La historia nunca termina… ¿Y la memoria?

summary: The Argentine government is facing criticism for dismantling health programs, underfunding public health, and cutting food assistance, which threatens maternal and child health.
source_title: Salud en riesgo: El impacto del ajuste en la vida de las y los argentinos

summary: Vecinos por Mercedes is confirmed to participate in the upcoming legislative elections.
source_title: Bernardo Zubeldía: “Las propuestas deben surgir de los vecinos, no de un manual partidario”

summary: A mural dedicated to journalist José Luis Cabezas, who was murdered for his work, is damaged. Local journalists worked together to repair it as a symbolic act of justice.
source_title: No nos olvidemos de José Luis Cabezas

summary: Journalists experienced repression during a protest in Buenos Aires. The government is using violence to discourage mobilization.
source_title: «Disparar una granada a la cabeza de un fotógrafo es un mensaje directo»

summary: Local cultural space 'Microcervecería 6600' hosting live music performances over the long weekend starting from Friday with Las Polillas de Poliéster, Virginia Altube and Damián Tessore.

summary: Funeral ceremony of an individual named Bria on April 18, 2021 from 8:00 AM to 10:45 AM at Casa Velatoria Municipal, followed by a response, inhumation at Local Cemetery and visitation at Calle 59 entre 18 y 20.

summary: The annual Expo Suipacha event will take place from April 24th to 27th, bringing together the local community for a combination of training, entertainment, and popular gatherings at the Predio de la Sociedad Rural de Suipacha, on Route 5, kilometer 128.5.

summary: No real-world event found.

summary: Funeral service for a 88-year-old individual will be held on April 21, 2025, at 11:30 AM in the cemetery of Mercedes. The vigil and viewing will take place on April 20, from 3 PM at the address Calle 503 y 500.

summary: Funeral ceremony of a 74-year-old individual will take place in Mercedes on April 21 at 10:00 AM, following official proceedings at the Iglesia San Luis. Previous vigil at Casa Velatoria No. 891 from 2:00 PM on April 20.

location: City not specified (mentioned: Iglesia San Luis)
summary: A funeral service will be held for c.a.s.r.y b.p. at the Church of San Luis on Tuesday, April 22, 2025, at 11:30 am. The gathering point is at the church atrium and the wake will take place at 21 N° 1089.

summary: Students of the Universidad Nacional de Pilar began their curricular classes after completing pre-enrollment. The intendente Federico Achával accompanied students on this occasion at both the Pellegrini and industrial park campuses.

summary: First Congress of Agroecology of the Peoples will take place at Universidad Nacional de Luján on 7th June 2025.

location: Mercedes (city or region not specified in the text)
summary: A workshop on plant propagation was held at the Municipal Vivero of Mercedes.

summary: The Cooperation Association of School Special No. 503 'Paul Harris' will start a series of open talks aimed at providing tools and information about the rights of people with disabilities and access to different resources. The first talk will take place on April 16, 2021, at 17:30 hours at the institution's headquarters.
source_title: Escuela Especial 503 abre sus puertas a la comunidad con un ciclo de charlas sobre discapacidad

summary: Court decision ratifies the resumption of construction works for an environmental center in Luján, Argentina.

summary: A professional course for those interested in childhood and adolescence topics titled 'Infancias y adolescencias hoy: desafíos e intervenciones desde la clínica y la educación' is ongoing. The course is happening virtually, allowing participation from various locations across the country.
source_title: Profesionales de la región ya participan del curso de actualización del Forum Infancias e invitan a sumarse

summary: A cultural campaign for autism awareness is launched in Mercedes, Argentina with the goal of promoting understanding, empathy, and inclusion. The campaign, called 'Building a World without Barriers', was declared a matter of legislative interest by the City Council.
source_title: La Peña Los Cuervos de Mercedes impulsa campaña de concientización sobre el autismo

summary: Free flu vaccine distribution event for seniors (65+) held in Gowland by the Municipalidad de Mercedes.

summary: The Ministry of Transport in Buenos Aires Province denounced 62 fake Verification Technical Vehicle (VTV) pages on Facebook and online marketplaces. This action was taken after it was found that the service was offered illegally.

summary: Transportation Ministry of the Province of Buenos Aires is taking measures to reduce road accidents during the Easter weekend.
source_title: Por Semana Santa, Transporte despliega operativos en toda la Provincia

summary: A report by the Thomson Reuters Foundation discusses how artificial intelligence is transforming journalism in the Southern Hemisphere. The study focuses on over 200 journalists across 70 countries in Africa, Asia, Latin America and the Middle East.

summary: Radio station Meridiano 105.3 is temporarily off-air due to renovation and optimization work aiming at improving transmission quality.

summary: Universidad Nacional de Luján (UNLu) opens enrollment for adults over 25 who have not completed secondary education to start a university career. Enrollment period is from April 15 to August 29 for the Cohort 2026.

summary: The second edition of 'Quesos en Escena' (Cheese on Stage), the Artisan Cheesemakers Meeting, is being held this Saturday in Mercedes. The main activities will take place at the Argentino Theatre, featuring gastronomic, cultural and local promotion proposals. The day starts at 11 am in Plaza San Martín with guided tours, tastings, a gourmet food fair, music, and a festive closing that will last until midnight. The event aims to be a meeting point for artisanal cheese producers and the public.
source_title: Todo listo para “Quesos en Escena”: este sábado, el Teatro Argentino será sede central del festival

summary: A robbery occurred at CISCO, a men's clothing store located on the corner of streets 14 and 25, in front of College San José, estimated to have taken 400,000 pesos in cash and various garments.

summary: Doctora Estefanía Spena sworn in as new assistant prosecutor of Carmen de Areco on March 15, filling a vacant position after the resignation of Juan Pablo Bonett. The move aims to strengthen the Public Prosecution Office in Carmen de Areco and improve service to citizens.

summary: A 59-year-old man was detained in Mercedes for a series of robberies using an inhibitor device to open vehicles and steal items. The suspect is from Chile and resides in the Autonomous City of Buenos Aires.
